snippet: The State Senate should follow the Assembly’s lead and approve legislation that has wide support from medical groups.
abstract: Editorial urges New York State Senate to allow vote on law approved by the State Assembly legalizing medical marijuana; contends bill has wide support from medical groups and patient advocates and polls show large majority of New Yorkers support use of medical marijuana.
lead_paragraph: The State Senate should follow the Assembly’s lead and approve legislation that has wide support from medical groups.
